data.scheme_name: Bihar Biofuels Production Promotion Policy 2023 - Land conversion fees - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides 100% exemption on land conversion fees.
data.eligibility:
1. Standalone distillery (single feed or dual feed) producing 100% fuel-grade ethanol as a Greenfield project.
  2. Units producing CBG/Bio-CNG.
  3. Units set up on a Zero Liquid Discharge (ZLD) basis.
data.conditions:
1. Must produce fuel-grade ethanol under the Ethanol Blending Programme (EBP) or supply ethanol for industrial use outside Bihar.
  2. CBG units must produce CBG under the National Policy of Biofuels and submit similar documentation.
  3. Units which are set-up on ZLD (Zero Liquid Discharge) basis shall be considered.
data.beneficiaries:
1. Standalone distillery (single feed or dual feed) producing 100% fuel-grade ethanol as a Greenfield project.
  2. Units producing CBG/Bio-CNG.
  3. Units set up on a Zero Liquid Discharge (ZLD) basis.
data.prerequisites:
1. Must produce fuel-grade ethanol under the Ethanol Blending Programme (EBP) or supply ethanol for industrial use outside Bihar.
  2. CBG units must produce CBG under the National Policy of Biofuels and submit similar documentation.
  3. Units which are set-up on ZLD (Zero Liquid Discharge) basis shall be considered.
  4. Entrepreneurs under these categories shall hold 100% stake in the Company/ Firm promoting the Unit.
data.context: The Bihar Biofuels Production Promotion Policy 2023 emerges from the state's need to enhance energy security and reduce environmental impact, leveraging its agricultural base to foster economic growth and align with national sustainability goals.
data.objective: The main objective of this scheme is to boost biofuel production, enhance energy sustainability, support rural economies, drive technological innovation, attract private investment, expand market adoption, and ensure compliance with environmental and quality standards.
data.description: Scheme provides 100% exemption on land conversion fees.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through this link:https://swc2.bihar.gov.in
data.funding_mechanism:
1. Stage-1 Clearance: Submit applications by June 30, 2024. Previously cleared units are also eligible.
  2. Financial Clearance: Submit applications by June 30, 2025.
  3. Land Allotment: Apply on the BIADA portal; decisions will be made within 7 working days.
data.additional_info:
• Incentive under this Policy shall be offered after commencement of commercial production by the Unit. 
  • Dovetailing with Central Government and state governmnet policies and schemes would be allowed under the Policy.
data.checklist_info_a:
Application Form
Certificate of Incorporation or Registration
Entrepreneurship Identification Number (EIN)
Project Report
Proof of Investment
Proof of Address
Bank Details
Land Documents
Environmental Clearance
Technical Feasibility Report
Financial Statements
Affidavit/Declaration
Proof of Biofuel Technology
SC/ST Certificate
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Department of Industries, Trade and Commerce 
Email      : sipb.care@bihar.gov.in
Phone    :  18003456214
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries - Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company, Public company - Bihar - All MSME and All Non MSMEs
